tweets.text:
In an interview at the Chinese Embassy, Ambassador Cui Tiankai, says China is working hard to fight the coronavirus and is accepting help from foreign experts.
#coronavirus @AmbCuiTiankai 
https://t.co/mcCtL9vFC1 https://t.co/ZEgDUVxTiu

Wang Yi: üá®üá≥ played a major role in reaching Paris Agreement. Its emission reduction target is met ahead of schedule every year. Its new energy vehicles and renewable energy installed capacity are 50% and 1/3 of the world. China honors its commitment with actions, not slogans. üí™ https://t.co/Nz3KD6vNab

"Do you really think the democratic system is so fragile that it could be threatened by a single high-tech company #Huawei?" Fu Ying, a female member of China's top legislature, questions US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, asking why she thinks Huawei is a threat, at the #MSC2020. https://t.co/nMIqe6VmT7

Wang Yi: With Chinese speed, we race against time to save lives of every patient. With our strength united as one, we fight against #COVID19 and stop its further spread. With its efforts and sacrifice, China won international respect and recognition. üá®üá≥ https://t.co/fDKZ5MKhzd

Wang Yi: Like pure gold is tested in fire, we will be stronger & more united after this epidemic. China‚Äôs economy will be more stable & sustainable. üá®üá≥ Hard times reveal true friendship. Our friendship and trust with other countries will be stronger & deeper. üåê https://t.co/SMEUfeqHX1

Q14ÔºöIs China prepared to welcome American health experts into China to help this #COVID19? Check the full transcript of my interview with 
@MorningEdition : https://t.co/12trEsrOGc https://t.co/0ZNO40zym8

Q13Ôºö What do you think about as you've watched this drama of American politics the last few months? Check the full transcript of my interview with @MorningEdition : https://t.co/12trEsrOGc https://t.co/CbI3dE6xs4

Q12: After that trade agreement, are #ChinaUS Relations on the way up? Or would you point in some other direction? Check the full transcript of my interview with @MorningEdition : https://t.co/12trEsJpxK https://t.co/RzDbABKHWU

Q11: Do you believe ‚Äòdecoupling‚Äô is happening, whether you would like it to or not? Check the full transcript of my interview with @MorningEdition : https://t.co/12trEsrOGc https://t.co/wCtQdsUkQ2

Q7: Some are comparing the US and China systems from the differences in responding to crisis like the #COVID19. How would you make that comparison? Check the full transcript of my interview with @MorningEdition : https://t.co/12trEsrOGc https://t.co/g23xaTvIN6

Q8: Is there a point at which China's government might have to decide the cost (in combating #COVID19 ) is too high? Check the full transcript of my interview with @MorningEdition : https://t.co/12trEsrOGc https://t.co/fUtRnzfEoY

Q9: Are you confident that you now know a reliable number of how many cases of #COVID19 there are and have an idea of the full scope of the problem? Check the full transcript of my interview with @MorningEdition : https://t.co/12trEsJpxK https://t.co/3K2eSiY86G

Q10: Have the broader strains in U.S.-China relations made it more difficult for the two countries to cooperate on this issue(#COVID19 )? Check the full transcript of my interview with @MorningEdition : https://t.co/12trEsrOGc https://t.co/r7zN6Qfxnr
Q2: Has this #COVID19 become a test of the effectiveness of China's governing system? Check the full transcript of my interview with @MorningEdition: https://t.co/12trEsrOGc https://t.co/tm2qU0Mc4m

Q3: Two top officials in Hubei province, the center of this outbreak, have been relieved of their duties. What went wrong?  Check the full transcript of my interview with @MorningEdition: https://t.co/12trEsrOGc https://t.co/FcUcMF1GXX

Q4: Does Dr. Li Wenliang‚Äôs story reveal a problem with openness and transparency in China? Check the full transcript of my interview with @MorningEdition: https://t.co/12trEsJpxK https://t.co/x46hwp5Jxt

Q5: Do you think that your government has lost some credibility with its people? Check the full transcript of my interview with @MorningEdition @NPRInskeep: https://t.co/12trEsrOGc https://t.co/nITzapPRZI
Q6: What role is President Xi playing now (in fighting #COVID19 ) ? Check the full transcript of my interview with @MorningEdition : https://t.co/12trEsrOGc https://t.co/CPDwF10lwY
Check my interview with @NPRInskeep. Q1: How severe is this #COVID19, in your view, compared to other crisis that China has faced in recent years? https://t.co/Z9ZmOPYYFH

Video shows a patient recovered from #COVID19 donates plasma in #Wuhan. The antibodies found in the plasma of some cured patients are believed to be "the most effective method reducing the mortality of critically ill patients": experts said. https://t.co/1YOg6huQnA

#COVID19 is an unprecedented challenge. So we are taking unprecedented responses to contain and control the virus, provide treatment to the people and reduce its impact on economic and social activities. https://t.co/qsOn4xzW7M

2/2¬†Wang¬†Yi:¬†China¬†is¬†going¬†all out¬†to¬†protect¬†our¬†people‚Äôs¬†health¬†and¬†stop¬†the¬†spread¬†of¬†the¬†epidemic¬†across¬†our¬†border,¬†a¬†contribution¬†to¬†global¬†public¬†health.¬†China¬†will¬†overcomethe¬†temporary¬†difficulties¬†and¬†achieve¬†economic¬†and¬†social¬†development¬†goals¬†this¬†year. https://t.co/A749CczBS9
During¬†his¬†visit¬†in¬†Berlin,¬†Wang¬†Yi¬†said¬†to¬†the¬†press¬†:¬†Virus¬†knows¬†no¬†national¬†boundary¬†and¬†calls¬†for¬†international¬†efforts¬†to¬†fight¬†it. https://t.co/B8lyrFe2Fq

@larry_kudlow said China lacks transparency? Fact: US President&Secretary of Health commend China's performance in fighting #COVID19. No winter lasts forever, every spring is sure to follow. https://t.co/oN7z6NlkWU

1/2 @StateDept¬†Strengthening China-US sub-national cooperation and people-to-people exchange serves interests of both. Chinese diplomatic missions & civil groups engage with US local governments to promote mutual understanding & cooperation. It‚Äôs totally above-board.

#cybersecurity Chinese gov‚Äôt & PLA never engage in cyber theft of trade secrets. The US has long been WATCHING other countries, its allies included. It still owes world explanation on WikiLeaks & Snowden revelations.

New confirmed cases of novel #coronavirus pneumonia outside Hubei Province in Chinese mainland have been dropping for six consecutive days, according to the National Health Commission:
- Feb 9: 444
- Feb 8: 509
- Feb 7: 558
- Feb 6: 696
- Feb 5: 707
- Feb 4: 731
- Feb 3: 890 https://t.co/p2OQF1itsN

In the spirit of human solidarity, I salute the doctors, nurses, caregivers and public #healthworkers on the front lines who, at personal risk, are doing their utmost to stem the #2019nCoV outbreak. They are the true heroes of this outbreak.

The real foundation of #ChinaUS relations is the friendship and mutual understanding between our peoples.¬†There is such enthusiasm among Americans¬†to develop friendship with Chinese people and facilitate cooperation between us. Nobody can go against the will of the people. https://t.co/sokzzpLRuU

It's really harmful¬†and¬†dangerous to stir up¬†suspicion, rumors and spread them among the people. This will only create panic, fan¬†up racial discrimination¬†and xenophobia, and harm our joint efforts to combat the #virus. #2019nCoV https://t.co/jfUmN5Muaz
